Package swen221.conway.util

Class ConwayAbstractRule

java.lang.Object
swen221.conway.util.ConwayAbstractRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rule
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContinueGenerationRule, ConwaysOverpopulationRule, ConwaysReproductionRule, ConwaysUnderpopulationRule, HappinessAgeingRule, OverpopulationAgeingRule, UnderpopulationAgeingRule
public abstract class ConwayAbstractRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rule
Implements a standard class for implementing the standard rules for Conway's game of life. Specifically, those based around the number of neighbours which are alive. In the standard game, cell's are either ON or OFF which, in our customizable version of Conway, corresponds to state 0 and state 9.

      public int apply​(int x, int y, BoardView board)
      Description copied from interface: Rule
      Apply a given rule to a board to determine the cell's current state.
      Specified by:
      apply in interface Rule
      Parameters:
      x - The horizontal position of the cell on the board whose state we are calculating
      y - The vertical position of the cell on the board whose state we are calculating
      board - The current state of the board
      Returns:
